DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate effect dose fluticasone furoate 100 μg ( microgram ) asthmatic subject age 5-11 year age . Fluticasone furoate currently development inhale corticosteroid component combination product contain inhaled corticosteroid long-acting beta-agonist . The study randomize two-way crossover , placebo control . During treatment period subject receive daily dose via novel dry powder inhaler 14 day . Approximately 26 subject recruit study , aim 20 complete study . Safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics serum cortisol level investigate .
